# Adding Text and Annotations in R

### Text Mode
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, text = rownames(mtcars)) %>%
  add_text()
```

### Hover Text
```{r, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, text = rownames(mtcars)) %>%
  add_markers()
```

### Styling Text
```{r, message=FALSE}
t <- list(
    family = "sans serif",
    size = 18,
    color = toRGB("grey50")
)
plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, text = rownames(mtcars)) %>%
  add_markers() %>%
  add_text(textfont = t, textposition = "top middle")
```

### Single Annotation
```{r, message=FALSE}
m <- mtcars[which.max(mtcars$mpg), ]

a <- list(
  x = m$wt,
  y = m$mpg,
  text = rownames(m),
  xref = "x",
  yref = "y",
  showarrow = TRUE,
  arrowhead = 7,
  ax = 20,
  ay = -40
)

plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg) %>%
  add_markers() %>%
  layout(annotations = a)
```

### Multiple Annotations
```{r, message=FALSE}
a <- list()
for (i in seq_len(nrow(mtcars))) {
  m <- mtcars[i, ]
  a[[i]] <- list(
    x = m$wt,
    y = m$mpg,
    text = rownames(m),
    xref = "x",
    yref = "y",
    showarrow = TRUE,
    arrowhead = 7,
    ax = 20,
    ay = -40
  )
}

plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg) %>%
  add_markers() %>%
  layout(annotations = a)
```

### Custom Hover Text
```{r, message = F}
mtcars %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~disp, y = ~mpg, color = ~factor(cyl), size = ~wt) %>%
  add_markers(
    hoverinfo = "text",
    text = paste("Displacement = ", mtcars$disp, "Miles Per Gallon = ", mtcars$mpg)
  ) %>% 
  layout(title ="Custom Hover Text")
```
